Biography

2023: Reserve quarterback who did not see any game action.

2022: Redshirt season…did not see any game action.

Prep: Joins the FIU program after passing for 3,140 yards and 22 TDs during his career at Bradford High School under head coach Brian Tomlinson… enjoyed a breakout senior campaign that saw him toss for 2,287 yards and 19 touchdowns, while averaging 190.6 yards per game.. had a QB rating of 100.2 and also rushed for 371 yards and seven TDs as a senior… was honored as the Florida 1A Player of the Year and was a first-team all-state selection… holds the Bradford High passing records for most yards in a single season (2,287) and most yards through air in a single game (361)… was also a member of Bradford High’s state championship basketball squad in 2022… earned second team all-state honors in basketball… graduated with academic honors and a 4.8 grade point average.

Personal: Was born on January 4, 2004 in Atlanta, Ga… parents names are Robin Smith and Adarin Jones… has a sister named Adrianna… intends on majoring in biological sciences.
